attributes.action: make "God Save the Queen" a Commonwealth and State National Anthem and select National Anthems for England, Scotland, Wales and Northern Ireland by referenda.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is wrong for England not to have its own National Anthem (there appear to be three popular alternatives: Land of Hope & Glory, Jerusalem & Rule Britannia) instead effectively hi-jacking God Save the Queen (which belongs to all Nations of the UK and the Commonwealth). All four Nations should have their own distinct National Anthems chosen by their own countrymen in referenda.
